events.title: God Did It Tour with Micah Tyler ft. Jordan St. Cyr & Emerson Day - Charlotte, NC
events.description: Get ready for the God Did It Tour with Micah Tyler, featuring Jordan St. Cyr and Emerson Day. Hear Micah perform his hits like Different Walking Free and Even Then along with Jordans powerful songs like Weary Traveler and Fires. Emerson Day brings her positive energy with songs like Get Behind Me to start the night. Its a night of music and encouragement you dont want to miss.SCHEDULE (subject to change):5:00pm - VIP M&G doors open5:15pm - VIP M&G begins5:30pm - VIP Q&A doors open5:45pm - VIP Q&A begins6:15pm - Early Entry doors open6:30pm - General Admission doors open7:00pm - Show begins IMPORTANT INFORMATION: Attendees over the age of 2 will be required to have their own ticket. events.title: Rhythm & Roots: Jazz, Blues, and You
events.description: Experience an evening where music, history and philanthropy meet! Rhythm & Roots will feature performances by legendary blues musician Mac Arnold and local jazz and blues artists, moving tributes and a celebration of Foundation For Black Philanthropy and a new generation of Black Giving Back. Be inspired by the music and by Charlottes Black philanthropic legacy as we honor the historical and cultural contributions of Black philanthropists whose generosity and leadership helped shape Charlottes story, with special tributes to visionaries such as Attorney James Ferguson, Elizabeth Randolph, Lethia Jones Henderson, and Jimmie and Minnie McKee leaders whose impact continues to resonate beyond their lifetimes.

events.description: Join your favorite true crime podcast hosts and experts for a live and in-person experience when "Exhibit C LIVE Presents: "Dr. Death" comes to a stage near you! Get a closer look into the gripping true stories of real-life doctors of death with host Matthew Shaer (Suspect) and our panel of experts including investigative journalist and host of the Dr. Death podcast, Laura Beil. Exhibit C LIVE is the ultimate true crime experience that will leave you on the edge of your seat! Doors 7pm. Show 8pm. events.title: Carolina Panthers v New Orleans Saints
events.description: Bank of America Stadium was designed for fans of all ages. Please note that every child over the age of 12 months is required to have a game ticket to enter the stadium. Any child under the age of 12 months admitted without a ticket must share a seat with an accompanying adult. Please be aware that this event is subject to NFL flexible scheduling procedures. The date and time for some games may change from what is currently reflected on the schedule and from what may appear on the ticket. For more detailed information regarding scheduling for the 2025 NFL Season, please visit https://www.nfl.com/schedules/flexible-scheduling-procedures

events.title: Panthers VIP Tailgate v. Saints at South Lawn Village
events.description: The Ultimate Tailgate Experience for the 2025-26 Panthers Season Located in South Lawn directly NEXT to Bank of America Stadium If you are a diehard Panthers fan and you want a VIP tailgating experience, check out the Panthers VIP Tailgate game day experience. Open three hours prior to kickoff for Panthers and opposing team fans. Come watch the ESPN pre-game breakdown All food and drinks (bar) are included in price All you can eat premium food stations exclusively created by Food Network Celebrity Chef Aaron May Live DJ Music Xbox gaming area inside the Panthers VIP tailgate

events.title: Registix Reserve Access NOT a Game Ticket - Saints v Panthers
events.description: THIS IS NOT A GAME TICKET. A separate game ticket is required to enter the stadium before entering The Registix Reserve . Enjoy an all-inclusive bar with craft cocktails, beer, wine, and numerous culinary options with premium entrees, snacks, and desserts. Get as close to the action as possible from field-side access. Watch players warm up steps away in pregame and feel the pulse of all the action throughout the game. The Registix Reserve can be accessed from when stadium gates open until (60) minutes after the game's conclusion.

events.title: The Trust Again Tour - Charlotte, NC
events.description: When something or someone breaks our heart, it can feel like our trust in God is shattered too. Maybe you find yourself asking: Why would He allow this to happen? Am I the only one suffering while the person who hurt me got away with it? God, where is your goodness in this? Friend, please know, you are not alone in these struggles. Lysa TerKeurst has been in your shoes and deeply understands. But shes also learned this truth: There will always be gaps in the trust we have with people, but there are no gaps in the trustworthiness of God. Thats why shes creating special one night events on the Trust Again Tour during the Fall of 2025 with worship leader, Tasha Layton. Each night will be filled with powerful worship, Biblical teaching and practical takeaways to help you experience healing in your heart, mind and soul.SCHEDULE (subject to change):5:00PM - VIP doors open5:15PM - Q+A Begins 6:00PM - Early Entry doors6:15PM - General Admission doors7:00PM - Event begins IMPORTANT INFORMATION: Attendees over the age of 2 will be required to have their own ticket.
